admission_text:
# Visit

## Plan Your Visit

### Locations & Hours

The Gallery and Museum Store are located at 100 N. Woodland Blvd. on the corner of N. Woodland Blvd. and New York Avenue in downtown DeLand.

### Gallery Hours

Sunday | 1 PM – 4 PM  
---|---  
Monday | CLOSED  
Tuesday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Wednesday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Thursday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Friday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Saturday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
  
### Store Hours

Sunday | 12 PM – 4 PM  
---|---  
Monday | 11 AM – 4 PM  
Tuesday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Wednesday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Thursday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Friday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
Saturday | 10 AM – 4 PM  
  
### Admission

General Admission: $5  
Special Exhibitions: $10  
Museum Members: No Charge  
Children 12 & Under: No Charge

### Directions

DeLand is exit 116 and 118 off Interstate-4 in Volusia County, Florida. DeLand is just 20 miles from Daytona Beach, Florida and 35 miles from Orlando, Florida. For more information about visiting DeLand and the Museum of Art – DeLand visit: [West Volusia Tourism](https://visitwestvolusia.com/)

### Parking

All parking in downtown DeLand is free. Parking for the gallery and Museum Store is available along the street, where allowed, and directly across N. Woodland Blvd. and south of New York Avenue in a public lot that allows for free 3-hour parking. There are also several other public parking lots in the downtown area.

## Groups and Tours

### Self-Guided and Group Tours
